column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The wait was ~45 minutes after we told them we would split our party of 5 up into 2 and 3. Luckily they were able to seat the 5 of us in the same area. Our groups of 2 and 3 were seated across from each other at one of the large tables. The tables have a large band white rocks down the center. The rocks add to the overall trendy decor of the restaurant
column2: but they made it difficult to talk to each other. If you get seated at one of these tables
column3: you will likely be sitting right next to a group of strangers.
